title: Handling Order State (Websockets)
content:
# Tracking Orders: Websockets vs Polling

Once an order is placed, we need to know if it filled.

## Polling (REST)
Periodically asking the server "Is my order filled?"
- Inefficient, hits rate limits.

## Websockets
A persistent connection where the server *pushes* updates to you.
- "Order #123 Partially Filled"
- "Order #123 Fully Filled"
- Real-time and efficient.
